title: SET_FORCE_LOW_LOD_ANCHOR_MODE
content:
0xB28B1FE5BFADD7F50xA739012A// SetForceLowLodAnchorMode
void SET_FORCE_LOW_LOD_ANCHOR_MODE(Vehicle boat, BOOL toggle);Parameters:boat: The target boat.toggle: Set the forced low LOD anchor mode. If true, the boat will remain in low LOD anchor mode even when a player is driving.Sets whether a boat should remain in the non-physical, low LOD anchor mode even when a player is driving it.Note: This native requires SET_BOAT_REMAINS_ANCHORED_WHILE_PLAYER_IS_DRIVER to be set to true to work properly.NativeDB Introduced: v323Old name:  _SET_FORCED_BOAT_LOCATION_WHEN_ANCHORED
codeBlocks:
// SetForceLowLodAnchorMode
void SET_FORCE_LOW_LOD_ANCHOR_MODE(Vehicle boat, BOOL toggle);
